goal:
Fecc is the voice of the Chemical Distribution Industry in Europe. With a growing membership of companies and national associations, Fecc represents around 1,600 companies, out of which around 850 are chemical distributors. Many of these companies are small and medium sized enterprises (SMEs). The Chemical distribution industry in Europe employs around 30,000 people and has an annual sales leverage of approximately â‚¬28 billion.

Fecc promotes initiatives such as Responsible Care, Product Stewardship and Good Trade and Distribution Practices. Fecc and its working committees provide services and information on current and proposed legislation to the members while at the same time providing feedback to the European Institutions.
interests: Business and Industry, Environment, Food Safety, Single market, Trade, Transport
